refnamediv.refpurpose: Using XML data for VSPX data-binding

refsect1.title: Preliminaries
refsect1.para: Usually data-bound controls as data-list, data-set etc. are using a relational data (from tables, local or remote). But in some cases data is available as XML, which is most convenient to use as such instead of filling and using an intermediate table as data source. For this cases VSPX components (which allows data-binding) supports special set of attributes (see documentation for details). With these attributes it is possible to bind XML data to the control's value, row-set etc.
